alert.note: Alert for Val Verde (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 27 at 5:57PM CDT by NWS Austin-San Antonio
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of east central Val Verde County through 700 PM CDT... At 557 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 12 miles west of Loma Alta, moving south at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Comstock, Loma Alta, Pafford Crossing, Bakers Crossing, Vinegarone, Devils River State Nat Area Del Norte, and Devils River State Nat Area Big Satan. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
